892580.name: Cuisine Royale - Italian Weeks Season Kitchen Pass
892580.description:
By purchasing the Godfather's cookbook, the kitchen pass for Italian Weeks, you will immediately get:

  • A unique gesture that will instantly resolve any disagreements when shown!
  • A unique suit and mask
  • +50% bonus to the experience you will receive in battles until the end of the season
  • Additional weekly challenges.

You will also have the opportunity to create more than 50 items to the recipes from the book:
  • 26 sprays
  • 17 boxer shorts
  • 12 masks
  • 7 suites
  • 7 cameramans
  • 7 tombstones
  • 4 gestures.

And that's not all!
892580.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
